resources.string: By turning your device into a portable Wi-Fi hotspot, you can share its internet connection with up to eight other devices at once.\n\nPlease notice that tethering will use mobile data. This may increase your call charges significantly and reduce battery life.
Please insert a SIM Card and restart the device to use portable Wi-Fi hotspot or tethering.
To turn the portable Wi-Fi hotspot on we will first need to turn off your Wi-Fi connection. Do you want to continue?
Set the default APN for tethering
Tethering cannot be turned on when USB is in use.
Show network operator in the status bar
Messaging is not your default SMS app.

Messaging app is tested by Orange to work on your device.


Using other SMS apps could cause problems sending and receiving SMS and MMS messages.


Use %s instead of %s as your SMS app?
